output_list.reason: The function balanceOf does not have any access control, which means anyone can call it and view the balance of any address.
The function transfer does not have any access control, which means anyone can call it and transfer tokens from any address to any address.
The function transferFrom does not have any access control, which means anyone can call it and transfer tokens from any address to any address.
The function approve does not have any access control, which means anyone can call it and approve any address to spend any amount of tokens on behalf of the caller.
The function allowance does not have any access control, which means anyone can call it and view the allowance of any address to spend any amount of tokens on behalf of the caller.
The function mintToken can only be called by the owner, but it does not have any access control, which means anyone can call it and mint tokens to any address.
The function freezeAccount can only be called by the owner, but it does not have any access control, which means anyone can call it and freeze or unfreeze any address.
The function changeName can only be called by the owner, but it does not have any access control, which means anyone can call it and change the name of the token.
The function changeSymbol can only be called by the owner, but it does not have any access control, which means anyone can call it and change the symbol of the token.
The function changeDecimals can only be called by the owner, but it does not have any access control, which means anyone can call it and change the number of decimals of the token.
